chatgpt.title: Great for quick drafts
chatgpt.author: Alex
chatgpt.text: Saved me hours drafting customer outreach. The tone suggestions are particularly useful.

chatgpt.author: Sam
chatgpt.text: Very capable, but sometimes the output needs editing for tone and factuality checks.

chatgpt.title: Unexpected hallucination
chatgpt.author: Priya
chatgpt.text: Most prompts are great, but I hit a hallucination when asking for obscure facts. Be cautious for research use.

midjourney.title: Awesome concept art
midjourney.author: Jordan
midjourney.text: Amazing outputs for concept art â€” great starting point for iterations.

midjourney.author: Casey
midjourney.text: Love the aesthetic results but sometimes composition needs manual cleanup.

dalle.title: Fast ideation
dalle.author: Maya
dalle.text: Great for quick visual mockups. Colors and styles are convenient for moodboards.

claude.title: Helpful assistant
claude.author: Riley
claude.text: Good for long-form replies and summarization. Occasionally verbose but accurate.

runway.title: Great for quick edits
runway.author: Taylor
runway.text: The video-editing tools are surprisingly capable for quick cuts and style transfer.

zapier.title: Automated workflows saved us time
zapier.author: Morgan
zapier.text: Integration was straightforward and reduced manual tasks across apps.

magicschool.title: Great tutoring features
magicschool.author: Jordan
magicschool.text: Helps structure lessons well; I'd like more interactive widgets though.
